title: Dress
description: Taffeta and tuxes and dresses and drama! This adorable trilogy chronicles the weeks leading up to the prom, culminating in the unpredictable, magical night itself.One week until prom, and counting . . .Jordan - I love my athletic, popular boyfriend. I do. But why is that mysterious new boy -- who happens to HATE prom -- making my heart flutter?Tara- My nemesis on the prom committee is determined to bring me down. All I need to do is find the perfect gown that will make her green with envy. . .Nisha - I can't believe my parents have picked a prom date out for me. What am I going to do if Brian, my REAL prom date, finds out?Will everything come together in time for the big night?
author: Jeanine Le Ny
